_sText:
EDIT : VERSION 2 UPLOAD ;) bug fixed



Shoot your ennemies with explosive cannon, flamethrower or rocket launcher :) 

The scene takes place in space, CT starts in a space laboratory which is going to explode, and they have to take a spaceship to survive. Then CTs have to cross the map (be carefull to the wind, it pushs you over the map :p) and to enter in the castle. T starts in this castle and fire CT with cannon :) 
The spawn is random, CT have 0.5 probability to start in the castle or in the labo and vice versa for the T.

I put some secret areas in the castle, secret button will open secret doors :p

To play in this map you should put the gravity to 400 ! (sv_gravity 400)

EDIT : DEMO HERE => http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G8_k5aJozX8
